translated: Giambattista della Porta Della Porta or Giovanni Battista (1535-1615) was an Italian Renaissance scholar, known for his work on physics, optics, chemistry, philosophy and cryptology.
original: Giambattista della Porta ou Giovanni Battista Della Porta (1535-1615) est un savant italien de la Renaissance, connu pour ses travaux sur la physique, l'optique, l'alchimie, la philosophie et la cryptologie.
